name: Analytics for Decision Making: Development & Implementation
content: Technology has generated huge amount of information that yield valuable insight leading to a boom in the data industry in the last ten years. Data analytics helps businesses and industries make smarter decisions of the vast volumes of information for further growth and development. You will learn to formulate ideas while overseeing data analysis from the managerial perspective. This programme is designed to highlight the significance of managing data processing throughout an organisation. It will elevate learner’s understanding and principles of data analytics and equip them with the fundamental knowledge and skillsets of data analyst. Date: 2 March 2023 Time: 9.00 AM – 5.00 PM Location: AC Hotel Titiwangsa by Marriot Kuala Lumpur Register now to join hybrid Analytics for Decision Making: Development & Implementation Programme
